meaningMnemonic: You have a <kanji>lack</kanji> of <kanji>point</kanji>s. These are things about yourself you wish were better. These are your <vocabulary>shortcoming</vocabulary>s.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. Just watch out because けつ is being shortened to けっ here!
